rosestrades.menu.more.welcome: Welcome to Roses Trades, a Minecraft mod created by Firelack. ðŸŒ¹
rosestrades.menu.more.focus: This mod focuses on collecting and trading special roses to unlock unique cosmetics.
rosestrades.menu.more.spawn: Roses spawn in specific biomes and increase your rose counter instead of dropping as items.
rosestrades.menu.more.menu_features: The menu will allow you to track your rose counter, spawn physical roses, craft bouquets, and access the shop and cosmetics inventory.
rosestrades.menu.more.future: Future features include buying cosmetics, equipping them, sharing custom cosmetics in multiplayer, and tracking achievements.
